column4: I'd quite like to split my screen down the middle to make "two mini ones", So I could have 2 "maximised" programs open at any one time. Is this possible? I hear it can be done on windows?
Compiz. Download extra plugin. Toggle on "grid" -- You can position the windows many different ways.
That may be just what I need, thank you.
No problem. Are you using computer or laptop?
I'm using a desktop computer, I've got a very nice widescreen, however all that wideness goes to waste 90% of the time, I'm looking for ways to improve my usage of it.

Great. It's easier on computer than laptop because of compact keyboard. You can have three columns, or three rows, or 9 windows, or not. You'll see what I mean when you install it and give it a whirl.
What is that you're trying to accomplish? You can use multiple Chromium windows. (or Firefox).
Thank you, grid is great.
No problem. You see how it work when you press it one or two more time? It change the size of the width.
